scripts.save:c: git add ../ && git commit -m "update README.md" && git push
scripts.install-service: mkdir -pv $HOME/.local/share/systemd/user && cp -v scripts/kv-ates.service $HOME/.local/share/systemd/user/kv-ates.service && systemctl --user enable kv-ates.service && systemctl --user daemon-reload
